reviews.review:
2代的传送门，剧情上是1代的正统续作，并且在2代增加了多人合作模式，和好友烧脑过关也是十分快乐。

建议和1代打包入库，经典游戏值得一玩。
Good game made me think twice, alot of fun with friends awesome to kill time.
Awesome gameplay.  Amazing story.

This game is amazing! i love to play this game and if you like puzzles this is a game for you but it has portals. it is my fav cuz the robots are funny, puzzling, FUN! bye and..... SPAAAAAAAAAAAAACCCCCEEE
Diversos puzzles interessantes, jogabilidade excelente, e enredo muito bem elaborado.
cheap and fun. doesn't update much. you can play others games and make your own, or just play the main levels
papas con cilantro
One of the best games in its time, highly suggest giving it a try.
Multiplayer made me cry. Great game though
Pretty cool game
fun game, funny characters
gud
Very intriguing puzzle game. Love the scientific theme.
yes

playing coop both makes you feel like a genius and a retard at the same time. it also gives you good motive to kill your friends.
playing singleplayer turns you into a subservient masochist who just exists to do others' bidding and be insulted.
overall 9.5/10, very iconic game, would play multiple more times. one of the best games of this century ig
Makes you realize how dumb your friends are.
It is creative

cool and very good
Mir persönlich gefällt diese Spiel sehr gut :) Man muss viel überlegen und grübeln aber es macht echt Spaß! Das Spiel ist auch richtig amüsant mit der Sympathie des Roboters :D

Simply put, this is one of the greatest puzzle platformers ever created. You will do yourself a great disservice by not playing this game. The storytelling is top notch and the humor is irreverent. Beat it when it launched on xb360. Purchased on steam just to play again. 10/10
Le jeu est vraiment cool que ce soit en coop ou en solo. Merci a Valve et sortez le 3 sinon je m'enerve
Fantastic game. Even better than the first. One of the all time great games!

on the flip side... If you've played this game and didn't like  it... you are a blight upon humanity

Play this game OR ELSE

Самая лучшая игра, персонажи очень интересные, не малый труд от русских переводчиков, которые передали ту атмосферу, что веяла на оригинальной озвучке. ГлаДос шикарная как всегда, самый хороший персонаж на мой взгляд (не учитывая тот факт, что она убила почти весь персонал и использовала их детей для тестов, а потом сжигала их). 
Музыка в конце самая крутая, люблю когда Гладос или же турели поют.
buenaaaardo
this is a game where the single player is 10 hours max, ive spen over 550 hours in it.

nice looking game really fun alot of mysteys
amazing game, is very hard tho but fun! and very long

p body and sherlock holmes is the best puzzle duo of all time!
Bleh, first one was better. Too much talking, glados is annoying and wheatley is really cringy
Creative game filled with puzzles and aha! moments. There was more to the story of this game than the first Portal. This game had a cool idea and executed it well. Would recommend!

Its a really fun puzzle game! It took a while to beat, but I totally like the way portals are used, it just is the best!

You play, you get stuck. You play again, you get unstuck, then get stuck again. You play again, you get unstuck, then get stuck again. You play again, you get unstuck, then get stuck again. You play again, you're still stuck, you cry, throw up, lie in bed, then quit the game for weeks. Then you write a review saying it's fun cuz it really is fun tbh. Uhhh it's not as fun as other games imo but I think ur better off watching youtubers do it, unless you're really up to the challenge.
Хорошая игра очень круто и конец где кубик вылител к нам мне ОООООООЧЕНЬ понравилось

这一个流程较长的解谜游戏，除了boos关和后期的某一关，整体对手残比较友好。谜题设计的比较精妙，其中不乏一些需要“自动化”处理和逆向思维的“典型例题”。部分关卡对观察力以及穷举能力要求极高（也可能是我连轴转了几个小时把人解傻了）。总而言之，言而总之这是一个很不错的解谜游戏欢迎尝试。
its great

Просто лучшая игра от Valve. 
+отличный перевод на русский.
+Отличный сюжет.
+Приятная графика
+Гемлей 9/10
+Мультиплэйер
+Полная поддержка гемпада.
-Легкие головоломки.
-Игра быстро проходится.
-При переходе в мультиплэйер нельзя выбрать робота.
Игру рекомендую!
